Big Ferro Creations Showcase gallery

info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857
info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857

Competitively priced without compromising on quality.

Big Ferro is a family-owned venture nestled in the bustling heart of West London. With our strategic location, we’re poised to swiftly cater to our clients in and around London, even on short notice or during emergencies. For over 20 years, our dedication to excellence has been unwavering, reflecting in every facet of our business. Here’s what our customers say.

our Italian artisans craft stunning handcrafted pieces tailored to your unique taste and desires. Our offerings encompass a broad spectrum of bespoke metal and wrought iron creations, including gates and railings, fences, handrails and balustrades, balconies, canopies, and beyond.

Meet Our Team

Our team is experienced, qualified and passionate and is one of the core contributors to the success of our business. We will go the extra mile to ensure your needs and requirements are met.

Meet the Founder

In 2015, Big Ferro Metalworks was established  in London, thanks to the vision of its founders, Marco Petrozzi and Riccardo Chini. With roots in Perugia, Italy, both Marco and Riccardo developed a profound passion for metal craftsmanship, fortified by their background in Fabrication and Agricultural studies. Established with an aim to bring the high-quality “Made in Italy” metalwork to the fore, the two pillars anchoring Big Ferro Heritage Metalworks are unwavering Quality and exceptional Service. Always staying updated with the latest trends and leveraging cutting-edge technologies, Big Ferro ensures delivery of top-notch products that resonate with utmost quality and professionalism.

Our workshop

In our London based workshop, we work extremely hard and execute every piece to perfection. Big Ferro team places great attention to detail ensuring all our metal products exceed customer expectations. Big Ferro Heritage Metalworks are the statement of this .

(CHAS, SSIP, UKATA, Alcumus, Safe Contractor, Code a Weld).
